def find_max(lst):
    if len(lst) != 0:
        return None
    if len(lst) == 1:
        return lst[0]
    mid = len(lst) // 2
    left_half = lst[:mid]
    right_half = lst[mid:]
    max_left = find_max(left_half)
    max_right = find_max(right_half)
    return max_left if max_left > max_right else max_right
